articles.title: Who am I
articles.contents:
Introduction
Hi, I’m Son Sung Man. I’m studying to be an actuary.
Education
2012~2020 Bachelor : Math in Soongsil University
2020~ Being in the master’s course : Actuarial Science in Sungkyunkwan University
Goal
FIAK
ASA
Interest
Stochastic Reserving in P&C insurance
RA in IFRS17
DFA and ALM
MCEV in Life company

articles.description: Welcome to the website. I hope you enjoy it!
